casebody.data:
In the Matter of J.Z.M., R.O.M., R.D.M. No. 366A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2007. Tyrone C. Wade, Charlotte, for Mecklenburg County DSS. Teresa M. Sprain, Raleigh, Matthew McKay, Sarah Motley, Charlotte, for Guardian ad Litem.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of November 2007 by Respondent (Mother) to Continue oral argument:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of November 2007."
